name: Ore Extraction
description:
A small game I created in roughly 12 hours. Your job is to scan the ground and extract the most valuable ores you can find. The max points you can gather per game is 30k.

  • [GAME DESCRIPTION] •

    • You must gather the most valuable ores you can find. You have 6 scans which you can use to gather information and 3 extractions to pick up ores. Note that whatever you extract, the surrounding area decreases by 1 level.

    Red = 10,000 points

    Orange = 5,000 points

    Yellow = 2,500 points

    Anything else = Less than 2,500 points (This will randomize every time and can range from 1/8th to 1/16th)

  • [CONTROLS & HOW TO PLAY] •

    • You can change modes by pressing the blue button at the top left of the screen.

    coming soon...

    Good Luck & Have Fun!

    [EXTRA INFORMATION]

    This was completed in roughly 12 hours and as a result it's not as optimized as I want it to be, but it should do the job just fine. Any feedback is appreciated. :)

    [CREDITS]

    Created by: Adrian Miasik
